00040 void SAXArrayHandlersTest::testCreation_startDocument()
00041 {
00042         ArrayData array;
00043         SAXArrayHandlers handler(&array);
00044         handler.startDocument();
00045         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(1);
00046 }

00049 {
00050         ArrayData array;

00052         handler.endDocument();
00053         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(1);

00057 /*! Converts a XML character string to wide string.
00058  * @param c1 The XML string to convert
00059  * @return The wide character string
00060  */
00061 static const XMLCh * StringToXMLCh_ASCIIONLY(const char * const c1)
00062 {
00063         int n = (int)strlen(c1);
00064         XMLCh *s = new XMLCh[n+1];
00065         s[n] = 0;
00066         for (int i=0; i<n; i++)
00067         {
00068                 s[i] = c1[i];
00069         }
00070         return s;
00071 }
00072 
00073 
00074 void SAXArrayHandlersTest::testCreation_startElement_with_bad_data()
00075 {
00076         class TestAttributes : public XERCES_CPP_NAMESPACE::AttributeList
00077         {
00078         public:
00079                 XMLSize_t getLength() const { return 2; }
00080         const XMLCh* getName(const XMLSize_t) const { return NULL; }
00081         const XMLCh *getType(const XMLCh *const ) const { return NULL; }
00082         const XMLCh *getType(const XMLSize_t) const { return NULL; }
00083         const XMLCh *getValue(const char *const ) const { return NULL; }
00084         const XMLCh *getValue(const XMLCh *const ) const { return NULL; }
00085         const XMLCh *getValue(const XMLSize_t) const { return NULL; }
00086         };
00087         ArrayData array;
00088         SAXArrayHandlers handler(&array);
00089         TestAttributes attributes;
00090         handler.startElement(NULL, attributes);
00091         const XMLCh *c = StringToXMLCh_ASCIIONLY("invalid_name");
00092         handler.startElement(c, attributes);
00093         delete [] c;
00094         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(1);
00095 }
